前提： 安装了 react-create-app（全局安装）、redux（局部安装）

// index.js
import React from 'react'
import ReactDOM from 'react-dom'
import App from './App'
ReactDOM.render(<App />, document.getElementById('root'))

// App.js
import {Component} from 'react'
class App extends Component {
    render() {
        return (
            <div className="App">
                hello
            </div>
        )
    }
}
export default App;

# 1. 在index.js中创建store

// index.js
import {createStore} from 'redux'
const counter = (state, action) => {
    state = state || 0
    if(action.type === 'add') {
        return state + action.payload
    } else {
        return state
    }
}
const store = createStore(counter)
function render() {
    ReactDOM.render(<App value={store.getState()}/>, document.getElementById('root'));
}
render()
store.subscribe(render)
1

# 2. 在index.js中将state的值和操作store的函数传给App子组件（只能这样传，否则App组件取不到store）

备注： 还有一种方法是根组件将store传给子组件，子组件再传给子组件（效果是一样的，都要一直传）

// index.js
function render() {
    ReactDOM.render(<App value={store.getState()}
                         add={() => {store.dispatch({type: 'add', payload: 1})}}
                         add2={() => {store.dispatch({type: 'add', payload: 2})}}
                         addAsync={addAsync}
                         addOdd={addOdd}/>, 
    document.getElementById('root'));}
1
2
3
4
5
6
7
8
// App.js
class App extends Component {
    add() {
        this.props.add()
    }
    add2() {
        this.props.add2()
    }
    addOdd() {
        this.props.addOdd()
    }
    addAsync() {
        this.props.addAsync()
    }
    render() {
        return (
            <div className="App">
                点击了：{this.props.value}次
                <div>
                    <button onClick={this.add.bind(this)}>+1</button>
                    <button onClick={this.add2.bind(this)}>+2</button>
                    <button onClick={this.addAsync.bind(this)}>异步+1</button>
                    <button onClick={this.addOdd.bind(this)}>奇数+1</button>
                </div>
            </div>
        )
    }
}

export default App;
